guideline.name: Annotation of FDA Label for clobazam and CYP2C19

relatedGenes.name: cytochrome P450 family 2 subfamily C member 19

text.html: "In CYP2C19 poor metabolizers ... the starting dose should be 5 mg/day and dose titration should proceed slowly according to weight, but to half the dose presented in Table 1 [of the drug label], as tolerated. If necessary and based upon clinical response, an additional titration to the maximum dose (20 mg/day or 40 mg/day, depending on the weight group) may be started on day 21." See label for more information.
